p: To evaluate the SERS activity of the silver nanowire membrane treated under the optimal CV conditions, the substrates were exposed to different concentrations of PATP (10 −7–10 −11 M); The corresponding SERS spectra are shown in Figure 5a. The positions of the peaks are basically consistent with those reported in the literature [ 42]. As is shown in the insect of Figure 5a, taking SERS intensities at 1077 cm −1 into consideration, the SERS signal intensities linearly decrease with the increasing of negative logarithm of PATP concentration within this concentration range. The linear equation was given in the inset of Figure 5a within the range of 10 −11–10 −9 M and the limit of detection (LOD) of the PATP concentration was discovered to be 3.7167 × 10 −12 M (LOD = 3 δ/ S, where δ is the blank standard deviation and S is the slope of the calibration curve) [ 43]. The conventional Raman spectrum of PATP is displayed in Figure S10a for comparison.
